name: eLQAS: Post-Campaign Monitoring on Mobile Devices
tagline: Tools for LQAS on mobile devices
body:
##Website Under Construction!
### Welcome to eLQAS Website
This website contains all the information you will need to implement Lot Quality Assurance Sampling (LQAS) on mobile devices. eLQAS was developed by the [Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation](http://www.gatesfoundation.org/What-We-Do/Global-Development/Polio) and [Nafundi](http://nafundi.com/) to improve the way we measure polio campaign coverage. You can read more about eLQAS and the pilot project in South Sudan on [Nafundi's blog](http://nafundi.com/blog/posts/elqas-collecting-real-time-polio-vaccination-data-with-odk/). eLQAS consists of:

1. An electronic form
2. An analysis tool
3. Documentation

All of which can be downloaded here.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this page? Contact arend.voorman@gatesfoundation.org
